original_text: Now therefore that I am come to speak of this thing unto my lord the king, it is because the people have made me afraid: and thy handmaid said, I will now speak unto the king; it may be that the king will perform the request of his handmaid.
korean_text: 이제 내가 와서 내 주 왕께 이 말씀을 여쭙는 것은 백성들이 나를 두렵게 하므로 당신의 여종이 스스로 말하기를 내가 왕께 여쭈오면 혹시 종이 청하는 것을 왕께서 시행하실 것이라

sentences.original_text: Now therefore that I am come
to speak of this thing unto my lord the king,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 일을 주 왕께 말씀드리려 하는 것은

sentences.original_text: it is because the people have made me afraid:
I will now speak unto the king;
it may be that the king will perform the request
